item.hungerrings.activate: Right click to activate, shift right click to take food and store it in ring
item.hungerrings.food_slot: The ring takes food out of the most top left player inventory slot.
item.hungerrings.enabled: The hunger ring has been enabled
item.hungerrings.disabled: The hunger ring has been disabled
item.hungerrings.no_food: You don't have food in your first inventory slot
